thread.title: Union Pacific Sales Fall on Coal Slump
thread.title_full: Union Pacific Sales Fall on Coal Slump - WSJ

author: Ezequiel Minaya
title: Union Pacific Sales Fall on Coal Slump
text:
Union Pacific Corp. reported a 10% slide in sales Thursday as weak coal carloads, a chief driver of demand, dented the top line.
The railroad also saw profit drop 5% in the three-month period ended Sept. 30 as lower fuel surcharges and negative business mix also pressured results.
Union Pacific said total volume dropped 6% in the third...
